title: Business & Finance
text:
The S&P 500 and the Dow rose 1.7% and 1.4%, respectively, closing at records, while the Nasdaq gained 1.2%, capping a volatile week.

---

The Athletic is in merger talks with Axios, part of a plan to build a larger online-publishing company that could include going public through a blank-check firm.

---

VW said it would seek compensation from former CEO Martin Winterkorn and the ex-chief of its Audi unit, Rupert Stadler , in the wake of the diesel scandal.

---

Boeing resumed deliveries of its 787 Dreamliner, a step toward moving past production problems with the wide-body jets.

---

Madison Square Garden Entertainment has agreed to acquire media operator MSG Networks for more than $900 million in a deal that reunites the companies.

---

Dominion Voting Systems sued Fox Corp .'s Fox News, seeking $1.6 billion in damages for what the company alleges were defamatory on-air comments.
